    PTH-06 S3 Client

    Class for creating a Amazon S3 client with required settings.
    Since:
    12/03/2021
    Author:
    Mikko Kortelainen, Kimmo Leppinen, Motoko Kusanagi

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pth06S3Client

        public Pth06S3Client(String S3endPoint,
                     String S3identity,
                     String S3credential)
        Initializes the builder with the required settings.
        Parameters:
        S3endPoint - S3 compatible endpoint without bucket name.
        S3identity - S3 access key.
        S3credential - S3 access secret.

    • Method Detail

      • withSigner

        public Pth06S3Client withSigner(Pth06S3Client.SignerKind signerKindArg)
        Defines which signing algorithm is used. Default is V2.
        Parameters:
        signerKindArg - Signing algorithm kind.
        Returns:
        Reference to this builder.

        Performs the build.
        Returns:
        AmazonS3Client using the builder's values.
